name: Void Ride
description: You have limited number of tiles to move. After your tiles end you wait for a moment to get them back. During that time, you are vulnarable. There are some diamods that can be melted down on your tail. They drop extra tile to collect and use. At 15 max tile and higher, you can use shield with "S". There are also checkpoints which you should click "F" to use. Arrow keys are controls.
